com.epam.finaltask.service

Class AccountService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.finaltask.service.AbstractService
      • com.epam.finaltask.service.AccountService

  • public class AccountService
extends AbstractService
    Service class which provides methods to add and manipulate database accounts.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AccountService

        public AccountService(DaoFactory daoFactory,
                      ConnectionManagerFactory connectionManagerFactory)
        Creates AccountService object with specified DaoFactory and ConnectionManagerFactory. Uses default DaoFactory or ConnectionManagerFactory implementation specified in AbstractService if corresponding factory parameter is null.
        Parameters:
        daoFactory - Factory used to create DAO objects
        connectionManagerFactory - Factory used to create AbstractConnectionManager subclasses

      • AccountService

        public AccountService(DaoFactory daoFactory)
        Creates AccountService object with specified DaoFactory. Uses default DaoFactory implementation specified in AbstractService if daoFactory parameter is null. Creates new ConnectionManagerFactoryImpl to be used as ConnectionManagerFactory.
        Parameters:
        daoFactory - Factory used to create DAO objects

      • AccountService

        public AccountService()
        Creates AccountService with default DaoFactory and ConnectionManagerFactory implementations specified in the AbstractService.

      • countAccounts

        public int countAccounts()
                  throws ServiceException
        Returns database account count.
        Returns:
        account count
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException has occurred when working with database

      • findRatingPageAccounts

        public java.util.List<Account> findRatingPageAccounts(int page,
                                                      int numberOfAccountsPerPage)
                                               throws ServiceException
        Returns accounts from the specific rating page.
        Parameters:
        page - Page number
        numberOfAccountsPerPage - Number of account displayed on one page
        Returns:
        Account on the page
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException has occurred when working with database

      • addValueToRating

        public boolean addValueToRating(long accountId,
                                int value)
                         throws ServiceException
        Adds chosen value to accounts rating. Returns true if rating was successfully added.
        Parameters:
        accountId - Id of the account which rating will be changed
        value - Rating value which will be added to the rating of the chosen account
        Returns:
        true if rating was successfully added
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException has occurred when working with database

      • changeAccountBlockState

        public boolean changeAccountBlockState(long accountId,
                                       boolean block)
                                throws ServiceException
        Changes account block state. Returns true if block state was successfully changed.
        Parameters:
        accountId - Id of the account which block state will be changed
        block - New block state
        Returns:
        true if account block state was successfully changed
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException has occurred when working with database

      • updateAvatar

        public boolean updateAvatar(Account account,
                            javax.servlet.http.Part part)
                     throws ServiceException
        Changed account avatar to the specified avatar.
        Parameters:
        account - Account which avatar should be updated
        part - Part which contains new avatar
        Returns:
        true if avatar was successfully updated
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException has occurred when working with database

      • findAccountById

        public Account findAccountById(long accountId)
                        throws ServiceException
        Returns account with specified from the database. Returns null if account with chosen id does not exist.
        Parameters:
        accountId - Id of the account to be searched for
        Returns:
        Account instance if account is found, null if account is not found
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException has occurred when working with database

      • findAccountById

        Account findAccountById(long accountId,
                        AbstractConnectionManager connectionManager)
                 throws ServiceException
        Returns account with specified from the database. Returns null if account with chosen id does not exist. Uses existing AbstractConnectionManager to find account.
        Parameters:
        accountId - Id of the account to be searched for
        connectionManager - AbstractConnectionManager subclass, which provides database access
        Returns:
        Account instance if account is found, null if account is not found
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException has occurred when working with database

      • promoteUserToAdmin

        public boolean promoteUserToAdmin(long accountId)
                           throws ServiceException
        Promotes user to administrator. Returns true if account successfully promoted to administrator.
        Parameters:
        accountId - Id of the account to be promoted
        Returns:
        true if account promoted successfully.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException has occurred when working with database

      • findAdministrators

        public java.util.List<Account> findAdministrators()
                                           throws ServiceException
        Returns list of all account which AccountType is AccountType.ADMIN.
        Returns:
        List of administrators accounts.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException has occurred when working with database
